perturbationx.vis.cytoscape.edge_to_p4c_format(src: str, trg: str, interaction: str)

Convert an edge to the format used by py4cytoscape.

Parameters:

  • src (str) – Source node name.

  • trg (str) – Target node name.

  • interaction (str) – Interaction type.

Returns:

Edge name.

Return type:

str

perturbationx.vis.cytoscape.init_cytoscape(graph: networkx.Graph, title: str, collection: str, init_boundary: bool | None = False, network_suid=None, cytoscape_url=DEFAULT_BASE_URL)

Initialize a Cytoscape network from a NetworkX graph.

Parameters:

  • graph (nx.Graph) – NetworkX graph.

  • title (str) – Network title.

  • collection (str) – Network collection.

  • init_boundary (bool, optional) – Whether to initialize boundary nodes. Defaults to False.

  • network_suid (int, optional) – Network SUID to update. Defaults to None. If None or invalid, a new network is created.

  • cytoscape_url (str, optional) – Cytoscape URL. Defaults to DEFAULT_BASE_URL in py4cytoscape (http://127.0.0.1:1234/v1).

Returns:

Network SUID.

Return type:

int

perturbationx.vis.cytoscape.load_network_data(dataframe: pandas.DataFrame, table: str, network_suid: int, cytoscape_url=DEFAULT_BASE_URL)

Load a pandas DataFrame into a Cytoscape table.

Parameters:

  • dataframe (pd.DataFrame) – The DataFrame to load.

  • table (str) – The table to update.

  • network_suid (int) – The network to update.

  • cytoscape_url (str, optional) – Cytoscape URL. Defaults to DEFAULT_BASE_URL in py4cytoscape (http://127.0.0.1:1234/v1).

perturbationx.vis.cytoscape.set_boundary_display(graph: networkx.Graph, show_boundary: bool, network_suid, cytoscape_url=DEFAULT_BASE_URL)

Set the display of boundary nodes.

Parameters:

  • graph (nx.Graph) – The graph to load boundary nodes from.

  • show_boundary (bool) – Whether to show boundary nodes. If boundary nodes were not loaded during initialization, they can be loaded in here. If boundary nodes have already been loaded, they are hidden.

  • network_suid (int) – The network to update.

  • cytoscape_url (str, optional) – Cytoscape URL. Defaults to DEFAULT_BASE_URL in py4cytoscape (http://127.0.0.1:1234/v1).

perturbationx.vis.cytoscape.color_nodes_by_column(data_column: str, network_suid: int, gradient=DEFAULT_GRADIENT, default_color=DEFAULT_NODE_COLOR, style=DEFAULT_STYLE, cytoscape_url=DEFAULT_BASE_URL)

Color nodes by a column in the node table.

Parameters:

  • data_column (str) – The column to color by.

  • network_suid (int) – The network to update.

  • gradient ((str, str), optional) – The gradient to use. Defaults to DEFAULT_GRADIENT (“#2B80EF”, “#EF3B2C”).

  • default_color (str, optional) – The default node color to use. Defaults to DEFAULT_NODE_COLOR (“#FEE391”).

  • style (str, optional) – The style to use. Defaults to DEFAULT_STYLE (“perturbationx-default”).

  • cytoscape_url (str, optional) – Cytoscape URL. Defaults to DEFAULT_BASE_URL in py4cytoscape (http://127.0.0.1:1234/v1).

perturbationx.vis.cytoscape.highlight_subgraph(nodes: list, edges: list, network_suid: int, highlight_factor=3, cytoscape_url=DEFAULT_BASE_URL)

Highlight a subgraph.

Parameters:

  • nodes (list) – The nodes to highlight.

  • edges (list) – The edges to highlight.

  • network_suid (int) – The network to update.

  • highlight_factor (float, optional) – The factor to multiply the default width by. Defaults to 3.

  • cytoscape_url (str, optional) – Cytoscape URL. Defaults to DEFAULT_BASE_URL in py4cytoscape (http://127.0.0.1:1234/v1).

perturbationx.vis.cytoscape.isolate_subgraph(graph: networkx.Graph, nodes: list, edges: list, network_suid: int, cytoscape_url=DEFAULT_BASE_URL)

Isolate a subgraph.

Parameters:

  • graph (nx.Graph) – The graph displayed in Cytoscape.

  • nodes (list) – The nodes to isolate.

  • edges (list) – The edges to isolate.

  • network_suid (int) – The network to update.

  • cytoscape_url (str, optional) – Cytoscape URL. Defaults to DEFAULT_BASE_URL in py4cytoscape (http://127.0.0.1:1234/v1).

perturbationx.vis.cytoscape.extract_subgraph(nodes: list, edges: list, network_suid: int, cytoscape_url=DEFAULT_BASE_URL)

Extract a subgraph.

Parameters:

  • nodes (list) – The nodes to extract.

  • edges (list) – The edges to extract.

  • network_suid (int) – The network to update.

  • cytoscape_url (str, optional) – Cytoscape URL. Defaults to DEFAULT_BASE_URL in py4cytoscape (http://127.0.0.1:1234/v1).

Returns:

The SUID of the extracted subnetwork.

Return type:

int

perturbationx.vis.cytoscape.clear_bypass(components: list, component_type: str, visual_property: str, network_suid: int, cytoscape_url=DEFAULT_BASE_URL)

Clear a bypass.

Parameters:

  • components (list) – The components to clear the bypass for.

  • component_type (str) – The component type. Must be ‘node’ or ‘edge’.

  • visual_property (str) – The visual property to clear the bypass for.

  • network_suid (int) – The network to update.

  • cytoscape_url (str, optional) – Cytoscape URL. Defaults to DEFAULT_BASE_URL in py4cytoscape (http://127.0.0.1:1234/v1).

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the component type is not ‘node’ or ‘edge’.

  • CyError – If a CyREST error occurs.
